content:
Hi all, especially @Isaac Vetter
See https://confluence.hl7.org/display/PC/IPA+2021-09-01?focusedCommentId=77369154#comment-77369154. Basically, I propose we initiate the columns of the table from the US Core, and see which of those resources are included in other sets of profiles. Then narrow from there as appropriate, based on how the table fills up.

OK as the approach for the start?
